 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָבַט‎</span>] **verb** ==reach, hold out==, to (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person) (properly ***grasp, hold***, so Late Hebrew (rare), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֵּית הַצְּבִיטָה‎</span> ***handle*** (of jug); Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hold firmly, seize***; Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***grasp firmly***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיִּצְבָּטלָֿהּ‎</span> [[Ruth.2.14|Ruth 2:14]] (accusative of thing).
